implementation.description: Added new method getUserProfileById(accountId: string, participantPlatformId: string) to fetch Instagram user profile by platform ID using Graph API

dodValidation.requirement: Method requests fields: id, username, profile_picture_url
Method returns InstagramProfileDto with username and profile_picture_url
Method handles API errors gracefully (returns null on failure)
dodValidation.notes: Wrapped in try-catch block that returns null and logs warning on error

dodValidation.requirement: Method uses existing rate limiter and retry logic
dodValidation.notes: Uses this.makeRequest which includes rate limiter and retry logic

unitTests.reason: No unit tests exist for InstagramApiService yet

notes: Method does one thing clearly: fetch profile by platform ID
Uses early return pattern via try-catch
Follows existing code patterns in the service
Error handling is graceful with null return instead of throwing
Method reuses existing infrastructure (makeRequest, getAccessToken, rate limiter)
Error handling matches requirement to return null on failure
Method is ready for integration testing
